p.d: In Episode 31 of the Occ-Cast, Occy is joined by Italo Ferreira, Filipe Toledo, Jadson Andre, Miguel Pupo, & Yago Dora - part of the new generation of young Brazilian surfers known as the Brazilian Storm. Occy gets a lesson in soccer from the boys, and the group talks on their special camaraderie, the promising young crop of young Brazilian up-and-comers, their biggest surfing influences, and much more.
